lines.name: Original Sin

explicitModifiers.text: All Elemental Damage Converted to Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Innocence rose to godhood not on inspired faith,
but on the vilification and hatred of another.

lines.name: Headhunter

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Nimis

explicitModifiers.text: Projectiles Return to you at end of flight
Projectiles are fired in random directions

lines.flavourText:
Too much of something is bad enough;
too much of nothing is just as tough.

lines.name: Ashes of the Stars

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Skill Gems
+(20-30)% to Quality of all Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
A single facet contains the wisdom
of countless disintegrated worlds.

lines.name: Stranglegasp
lines.flavourText: Death's approach brings clarity.

explicitModifiers.text: Modifiers to Attributes instead apply to Omniscience

Attribute Requirements can be satisfied by (15-25)% of Omniscience

lines.flavourText:
That winter, scorched refugees emerged from the shrine,
speaking only in strange tongues. They prayed to a new
symbol of power, not out of love, but out of fear.

lines.name: Polaric Devastation

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% increased Duration of Ailments on Enemies
Left Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Ash for 5 seconds when you Ignite them
Right Ring slot: Cover Enemies in Frost for 5 seconds when you Freeze them

lines.flavourText:
Those that escaped the annihilating light
sank eternally into crushing darkness.

lines.name: Uzaza's Mountain
lines.flavourText:
The narrow path turned to rough rocks that led towards the sky.
One last obstacle in a life-long journey
to find a land they could call home.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Meadow and Valley ring at a Vendor.}

lines.name: Shavronne's Revelation

explicitModifiers.text: Right ring slot: You cannot Regenerate Mana

Right ring slot: +250 to maximum Mana
Left ring slot: You cannot Recharge or Regenerate Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
"Shavronne held Sanity in her right
hand and Revelation in her left.
Brutus chose the left hand."
- Kadavrus, Surgeon to the Umbra

lines.name: Presence of Chayula

explicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% of Maximum Life Converted to Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: The dreamer stirs, the world trembles.

lines.name: Aul's Uprising

explicitModifiers.text: Nearby Enemies grant 25% increased Flask Charges
Hits against Nearby Enemies have 50% increased Critical Strike Chance
Nearby Enemies have 10% reduced Stun and Block Recovery
Purity of Lightning has no Reservation
Purity of Ice has no Reservation
Purity of Fire has no Reservation
Purity of Elements has no Reservation

lines.flavourText:
It was not his fearlessness or ferocity, nor his tactical genius,
it was his leadership that earned Aul, the Last King, his crown.

lines.name: Replica Headhunter

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Damage with Hits against Magic monsters
20% chance when you Kill a Magic Monster to gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"A type Delta test subject escaped with Prototype #18. He was last seen
ten times the height of a man and crashing straight through walls."

lines.name: Anathema

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Cast a Curse Spell
Your Curse Limit is equal to your maximum Power Charges

lines.flavourText:
Enraged by the incompetence of mortals
The demon-lord opens a gateway
Unleashing a litany of pain upon the world.

lines.name: Putembo's Mountain
lines.flavourText:
He surveyed his lands, green and vital,
watched with pride as his slaves quarried fine stone for his fortress,
and thanked the heavens for his many blessings.
But this pilgrimage to the peak was to be his last.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Meadow and Valley ring at a Vendor.}

lines.name: Ahkeli's Valley
lines.flavourText:
The river, once fertile and fresh, 
and flowing briskly to the sea,
now stood, stained, at a standstill.
Dammed by the coagulating dead.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Meadow and Mountain ring at a Vendor.}

lines.name: Coward's Legacy

explicitModifiers.text: (50-60)% increased Effect of Curses on you
You count as on Low Life while you are Cursed with Vulnerability

lines.flavourText:
Death is your most important duty.
Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

lines.name: Replica Atziri's Foible

explicitModifiers.text: Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText:
"A rare unequivocal success, Prototype #11 causes wounds to heal so quickly
the type Delta test subject actually survived the entire testing regimen."

lines.name: Astramentis

explicitModifiers.text: -4 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
Mindless rage will shake the world,
Cunning lies will bend it.
Reckless haste will break the world,
And into darkness send it.

lines.name: Eternal Damnation

explicitModifiers.text: Gain additional Elemental Damage Reduction equal to half your Chaos Resistance

lines.flavourText: The price of immortality is isolation.

lines.name: Putembo's Meadow
lines.flavourText:
The fields were silent but for the plucking of fruits,
the rustling of leaves, and the breaking of stone.
No slave dared to speak or look the passing king in the eye.
No one... except Aul.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Mountain and Valley ring at a Vendor.}

lines.name: Replica Emberwake

explicitModifiers.text: Ignites you inflict deal Damage (35-54)% faster

lines.flavourText:
"The flames raced through Lab Five with incredible speed, but were extinguished
just as quickly. This could have been much worse." 
- Lead Researcher Ksaret

lines.name: The Magnate

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to deal Double Damage while you have at least 200 Strength
5% chance to deal Triple Damage while you have at least 400 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Few men cast a longer shadow
 than the Great Meginord of the North.

lines.name: Choir of the Storm

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Lightning Bolt when you deal a Critical Strike
Critical Strike Chance is increased by Overcapped Lightning Resistance

lines.flavourText:
But the fool did not bow.
The fool stood and questioned.
And the fool was unwritten.

lines.name: Atziri's Foible

explicitModifiers.text: Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText:
The world is but a piece of parchment, blank and symmetric. 
We label each side: one Good, one Evil; one Black, one White. 
The divine truth, however, is that both are one and the same. 
-Jaetai, Vaal Advisor

lines.name: Ahkeli's Meadow
lines.flavourText:
Where once had stood a village, lay naught but splinters.
Some had once been her home. 
Some had once been her creations.
Some had once been her family.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Mountain and Valley ring at a Vendor.}

All creatures have the potential for greatness
or unequivocal failure.

Modifiers to number of Projectiles instead apply
to the number of targets Projectiles Split towards

lines.flavourText: A single act of anger travels countless paths of destruction.

Damage Penetrates (20-24)% Cold Resistance against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A single moment sets in motion an eternal fall,
beneath which all are buried.

lines.name: Death Rush

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Adrenaline for (2-3) seconds on kill
Gain Adrenaline for 1 second on kill

lines.flavourText: To truly appreciate life you must be there when it ends

lines.name: Xoph's Blood

explicitModifiers.text: Cover Enemies in Ash when they Hit you

lines.flavourText:
We are his blood.
Through us he carries his burning message.

lines.name: Zerphi's Heart

explicitModifiers.text: Items and Gems have 50% increased Attribute Requirements

Gain Soul Eater for 20 seconds when you use a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText: We are incapable of change without sacrifice, for we are both the iron and the forge.

lines.name: Uzaza's Meadow
lines.flavourText:
Cold winds blasted what little grew on the icy surface.
The gifts of the land lay hidden deeper,
and only patience and persistence would free them.

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Shaper's Presence for 10 seconds when you kill a Rare or Unique Enemy
Temporal Chains has no Reservation if Cast as an Aura

lines.flavourText:
Time, like light, can be refracted into all its myriad colours.
The first shade is beautiful, but the last will drive the unwary insane.

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (4-7)% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
"Curious. The test spike penetrated the subject's flesh, but the chest wound
was not as deep as expected. There is something here..."

- Lead Researcher Ksaret

lines.flavourText:
With her cold resolve
And burning sacrifice
The Eternal twins arose.

I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

lines.name: Putembo's Valley
lines.flavourText:
With no stone for rebuilding, each storm took its toll on the village.
Huts eventually collapsed, their occupants injured or dead.
Bodies were left by the river, to appease the gods.
But the dead would not remain there.

I accept my guilt without shame. It is my gift to humanity.

lines.flavourText:
"In testing, Prototype #9 had no effect on fired arrows. However,
an unknown spell did destroy the entire firing chamber."

lines.flavourText:
The sun's fury, trapped
in pillars of blazing light,
Explodes from its cage.

lines.flavourText: Make your mark on history.

lines.flavourText:
Beyond the veil of death, there burns a fire
by whose light night is borne.

"Moon after moon did Berek make fools
Of the great and Untamed Three
Until malice for a Brother
Slew the hatred of the Other
And Berek did hunt
Alone and free."
- Berek and the Untamed

Until furious Flame scaled the mountain
Berek escaped through the thaw
And Frost's tortured moans."
- Berek and the Untamed

and each time, the ring soon washes ashore once more, 
still wrapped around a severed finger.

Where her mouth should have been
there was only a whirling, black void.

Doryani stumbled into a realm of madness
And awoke its Master.

lines.flavourText:
By its light, Lori led her young charges to safety 
and bound up their wounds. 
Her sword arm was iron, yet her heart gentle 
and proof against hate.

lines.flavourText:
"Marylene stroked the medallion at her breast 
before every duel and every cast of the die." 
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.flavourText:
When a fallen leader's body is taken to the funeral peak,
those who seek power must ascend together.
One returns with the seal. 
The rest do not return at all.

They wrap around you
until your blood turns as cold as theirs.

A gift from Tasalio, God of Water,
to the chieftain Rakiata.
Kaom took Rakiata's head and hand
so that his warriors' axes might rise and fall like the waves.

The ring I stole,
My finger they took,
A shrouded mind,
Cut their curses short,
As I drained their spirit
And stole their soul.
A blessing is often a curse.

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Attack Damage per 200 of the lowest of Armour and Evasion Rating

lines.flavourText:
"Some blows must be evaded. Some blows must be endured.
The trick is to tell them apart."
- Daresso, the Sword King

When your skin sloughs, and your blood cooks,
you'll wish the lightning strike had killed you.

lines.flavourText:
But the grain grew twisted and the water turned dark
and those who partook of Mother Gull's gift
birthed monsters that fed 
on the flesh of one another.

Those members of the Brotherhood who employ the venom of

The Thaumaturgical masters of the Eternal Empire,
as unpredictable and varied as they were,
all understood one thing:
Free thinking leads to free action.

A gift from Ngamahu,
a sign to the Karui to spread like fire.
Given to Akoya, but inherited by Kaom with the swing of his axe.

Maligaro did the cutting... at her request.
In the new void, a malevolent power emerged.

lines.name: Soul Tether

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (4-6)% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield

Vaal bloodpriests were among the earliest intellectuals on record. 
It was they who found that a newly freed soul would 
desperately cling to any other source of life.

lines.name: Belt of the Deceiver

explicitModifiers.text: You take 30% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

In battle, virtue matters not.

lines.flavourText:
Forged from the blood of countless wars,

Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."

When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

lines.name: Kaom's Sign
lines.flavourText:
A token from the sea
A sign for Kaom
to lead his Karui to Wraeclast.

When the wind blows, 
Know which way to bend
and watch the others break.

Kaom's strength was rivaled only by
the great Meginord of the north.

But I've seen what they can do. I've felt it.
And now I must live with that terrible knowledge.

A perfidious meal indeed.

until fate pulled you away.

A single step forward
Snap free from the prison
Reborn into freedom eternal

lines.flavourText:
Long ago, the ocean was a puddle where a golden fish dwelt,
who lit the ocean from within and kept the water fresh.
When the sky burned, the fish dived deep,
never to return, and the waters turned sour.

lines.name: Daresso's Salute

lines.flavourText:
"A bit short in the arm, are you? 
Then you'll be short of a head soon enough."
- Daresso the Daring

When slaughtered flesh falls silent,
the soul may yet scream on.

"...and so He said: 'Let only the good meet my gaze'
and no eye met His. So He called down the cleansing flames
and let black smoke sweep the Sinners away."
- Book of Innocence

lines.name: Faminebind

After the Great Fire, the land lay barren
and our forefathers grew weak.
Mother Gull took pity on them
and gave them grain and water.

Our forefathers danced and drank and ate their fill
and did not honour the First Ones for their gifts.
So the First Ones filled the sky with fire.

"Our genius will pave the way forward.

and the dog cowers before Man,
so too should we cower before the First Ones
and pray we never learn of what comes next.

But every night they gather and grow,
and all but the strong and the stupid
seek shelter from their grasp until daybreak.

explicitModifiers.text: -2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

A large enough debt turns even a friend
into an enemy, and the Perandus family
had more debtors than anyone.

lines.flavourText: The breath of life is yours to give.

lines.name: Stone of Lazhwar
lines.flavourText:
You are slow, foolish and ignorant.
I am not.

A shimmering symbol of Purity, clear as water,
but I know better than most how quickly
Purity can succumb to Corruption.
How quickly water turns to blood.
- Victario, the People's Poet

- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Warped Timepiece

As you have lived, so you shall die 
forever trying to keep up with me. 
Your blood on these hands of mine
forever makes me the public enemy.

lines.name: Gluttony

explicitModifiers.text: You have Culling Strike against Cursed Enemies
Gain (20-28) Life per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Gain (10-14) Mana per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Take (100-200) Physical Damage when you use a Movement Skill
You have no Armour or Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
What started as a desire to feed
became a desire to learn...

lines.name: Perquil's Toe

explicitModifiers.text: Lightning Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Lucky
Nearby Allies' Damage with Hits is Lucky

lines.flavourText: He was a lot luckier before he lost this.

lines.name: The Primordial Chain

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to maximum number of Summoned Golems

lines.flavourText:
The leash of the lifegiver
binds in both directions.

lines.name: Hyrri's Truth

explicitModifiers.text: Precision has 100% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText: Strike true, strike hard, and leave no survivors to retaliate.

lines.name: Siegebreaker

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 5% chance to Taunt on Hit with Attacks
Your Minions spread Caustic Ground on Death, dealing 20% of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage per second

lines.flavourText: Poison the land and they'll have nothing to defend.

lines.name: Willowgift

explicitModifiers.text: You do not inherently take less Damage for having Fortification
+4% chance to Suppress Spell Damage per Fortification
(15-25)% increased Attack and Cast Speed while at maximum Fortification

lines.flavourText: The storm cannot break that which bends.

lines.name: Retaliation Charm

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
Blind does not affect your Light Radius
Blind you inflict is Reflected to you
(10-20)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Blinded

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye.

lines.name: Pyroshock Clasp

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Enemies Ignited by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Fire
Enemies Shocked by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Lightning

lines.flavourText: Teach a man to burn, and you'll be warm for the rest of his life.

lines.name: The Ephemeral Bond

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40)% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've gained a Power Charge Recently
(1-2) to (36-40) Lightning Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
For how little time they had together,
their love was all the more powerful.

lines.name: The Druggery

explicitModifiers.text: Life Flasks gain 1 Charge every 3 seconds
100% of Life Recovery from Flasks is applied to nearby Allies instead of You

lines.flavourText:
"This will help with the pain.
One for you... and one for me."
- Doctor 'Shaky Hands' Opden
